content: 2nd to last st half_double_crochet in ch2 fasten_off button band 4mm hook left front for girls right front for boys rrooww 11 wwiitthhrriigghhttssiiddeeffaacciinngg jjooiinnyyaarrnnttoo oouuttssiiddeeccoorrnneerr ooffrriibbbbiinngg cchh11 sscc iinnssaammee ssttaannddtthheennwwoorrkk 4444 5522 6600 ffuurrtthheerrsscceevveennllyy aalloonnggffrroonntt 4455 5533 6611 sstt edge to outside corner of ribbing turn row 2-3 ch1 single_crochet to end turn row 4 ch1 single_crochet to end fasten_off buttonhole band 4mm hook right front for girls left front for boys row 1-2 as row 1-2 of button band 45 53 61 st row 3 ch1 single_crochet 1 3 2 *chain 2 skip next 2st single_crochet 6 7 9 * repeat from* to* 5 times ch2 skip next 2 st sc2 3 2 turn row 4 ch1 single_crochet 2 3 2 *work 2 single_crochet in 2ch space single_crochet 6 7 9 * repeat from* to* 5 times work 2 single_crochet in 2ch space single_crochet 1 3 2 fasten_off sew buttons on to button band in line with buttonholes and darn in all ends body 3 inches 5 6 7 inches 2 inches 6 5 7 7 5 inches 9 11 13 13 14 15 inches inches 26 28 30 inches sleeve 11 12 5 14 inches 7 5 8 8 5 inches 10 11 12 inches
